article_text:
Engagement Rings

As part of his lavish marriage proposal, this man used a drone to fly the engagement ring to a San Francisco park where he was asking his then-girlfriend for her hand. How could she say no?
article_summary:
Engagement RingsAs part of his lavish marriage proposal, this man used a drone to fly the engagement ring to a San Francisco park where he was asking his then-girlfriend for her hand.
How could she say no?
